sentences.en: And God responded to the entreaty for the land after that.
sentences.cn: 此后神应允国民为那地所恳求的.

sentences.en: And Jehovah responded to the entreaty for the land and the plague was stayed in Israel.
sentences.cn: 如此,耶和华应允国民为那地所恳求的,灾疫在以色列人中就止住了.

sentences.en: But the teacher declined all entreaty, and took his leave upon the spot.
sentences.cn: 但是那位教师谢绝了一切邀请, 立即告辞了.

sentences.en: Give to value in this entreaty headquarters, and work out an above problem.
sentences.cn: 在此恳请总部给予重视, 并解决以上问题.

sentences.en: He felt very uncomfortable and looked entreaty at us.
sentences.cn: 他感到很不自在,用恳求的目光望着我们.

sentences.en: He knelt in front of the emperor with a look of entreaty.
sentences.cn: 他面带恳求的神态跪在皇帝面前.

sentences.en: Her gaze clung to him in entreaty.
sentences.cn: 她的眼光带着恳求的神色停留在他身上.

sentences.en: I have no will to resist thine; rather, my heart met Tito's entreaty at itsfirst utterance.
sentences.cn: 我不想来阻挠你, 还不如说, 蒂托的恳求一说出口,就是符合我们心愿的.

sentences.en: She declined the Republican Party's entreaties to run for his seat.
sentences.cn: 她拒绝了共和党让她竞选他的席位的数次恳求。

sentences.en: She ruled more by entreaty and persuasion than by command or argument.
sentences.cn: 她也不是靠发号施令和争辩,而是靠央求和规劝来管理的.

sentences.en: So we fasted and sought our God concerning this matter, and He listened to our entreaty.
sentences.cn: 拉8:23所以我们禁食祈求我们的神 、 他就应允了我们.

sentences.en: The Bible contains one continuous entreaty to cast out fear.
sentences.cn: 圣经中不断的祈求人们能驱走恐惧.

sentences.en: The lake lies the hill , a tearful entreaty of love at the foot of the inflexible.
sentences.cn: 湖低低地偃卧山前, 将一份泪水盈盈的乞爱哀辞摆在铁石心肠者的脚边.

sentences.en: The usual telegrams of entreaty and remorse followed: I disregarded them.
sentences.cn: 同往常一样的那些哀求悔过的电报跟着就来了.

sentences.en: This exordium, and Miss Pross's two hands in quite agonised entreaty clasping his, decided Mr. Cruncher.
sentences.cn: 这一番言辞, 再加上普洛丝小姐两只手攥住他的手, 表现了痛苦的请求,使克朗彻先生下定了决心.

trans.tran_en: a serious request in which you ask someone to do something for you
